title: 7/12/17 - Conservatives don't read? (David French and Brian Lilley Join Glenn)
description:
How important is the Donald Jr./Russia story? ...How does this story affect your life? ...David French from National Review discusses the Donald Trump Jr./Russia story and how it's related to world events ...Canadian journalist Brian Lilley explains how Canadian taxpayers are paying millions to a killer terrorist while the family of a murdered American soldier get nothing ...Missing time capsule?

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
